fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Caw at a player, decreasing their defense by one stage until they are healed or protected. Players with a defence of None will gain Vulnerable defence.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If one or more Striked players are alive, players who visit your target will also have their defense lowered.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, gain basic defense.
- Deaths that occur from being visited with vulnerable defense will have no specified cause of death.
